duck: Virtual Device Interface, a component of Digital Research's Graphical Environment Manager (GEM)
VDI (file format), the virtual disk image file used in VirtualBox systems
Verein Deutscher Ingenieure, the Association of German Engineers
VDI VMware's umbrella term for its desktop virtualization products that use VMware server virtualization and Virtual Desktop Manager.

wiki.text:
'VDI' may refer to: *(variable direct injection) technology which is implemented
in cars, preferably in diesel engines.
* VDI, a code for Vidalia Regional Airport
* VDI (file format), the virtual disk image file used in VirtualBox systems
* Verein Deutscher Ingenieure, the Association of German Engineers
* Virtual Desktop Infrastructure; see
* Virtual Device Interface, a component of Digital Research's Graphical
  Environment Manager (GEM)
wiki.title: VDI
